column4: ve a problem on Ubuntu 9.04 with all USB Drives! It seems that my system don't see them... Any tips?
Hi all, i have a problem on Ubuntu 9.04 with all USB Drives! It seems that my system don't see them... Any tips?
are you sure your computer recognizes your USB card?
it sounds like it's a problem beyond me then... you should include more details in your request for help, so someone would know if they are equipped to help you.
